title: Awesome List Updates on Feb 06, 2025
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Feb 06, 2025 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Terminal Apps / Databases

*   [alacritty (‚≠ê59k)](https://github.com/jwilm/alacritty) - A cross-platform, GPU-accelerated terminal emulator. [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software")](https://github.com/jwilm/alacritty) ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
*   [Ghostty (‚≠ê33k)](https://github.com/ghostty-org/ghostty) - A fast, feature-rich, and cross-platform terminal emulator that uses platform-native UI and GPU acceleration. [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software")](https://github.com/ghostty-org/ghostty) ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
*   [kitty (‚≠ê28k)](https://github.com/kovidgoyal/kitty) - A cross-platform, fast, feature full, GPU based terminal emulator. [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software")](https://github.com/kovidgoyal/kitty) ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")
*   [Termius](https://www.termius.com/) - A beautiful SSH and SFTP client for Mac. It is also available for mobile. ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware") [![App Store](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-app-store.svg "App Store Software")](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/termius-terminal-ssh-client/id549039908)
*   [Warp](https://www.warp.dev) - Warp is a blazingly fast, rust-based terminal reimagined from the ground up to work like a modern app.
*   [WezTerm](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/) - A GPU-accelerated cross-platform terminal emulator and multiplexer implemented in Rust. [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software") ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")](https://github.com/wez/wezterm)
items.content_html:
Terminal Apps / Databases

  • alacritty (‚≠ê59k) - A cross-platform, GPU-accelerated terminal emulator.
  • Ghostty (‚≠ê33k) - A fast, feature-rich, and cross-platform terminal emulator that uses platform-native UI and GPU acceleration.
  • kitty (‚≠ê28k) - A cross-platform, fast, feature full, GPU based terminal emulator.
  • Termius - A beautiful SSH and SFTP client for Mac. It is also available for mobile.
  • Warp - Warp is a blazingly fast, rust-based terminal reimagined from the ground up to work like a modern app.
  • WezTerm - A GPU-accelerated cross-platform terminal emulator and multiplexer implemented in Rust.

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Bot Building

*   [arikawa (‚≠ê531)](https://github.com/diamondburned/arikawa) - A library and framework for the Discord API.

### Goroutines

*   [rill (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/destel/rill) - Go toolkit for clean, composable, channel-based concurrency.

### Machine Learning

*   [catboost-cgo (‚≠ê16)](https://github.com/mirecl/catboost-cgo) - Fast, scalable, high performance Gradient Boosting on Decision Trees library. Golang using Cgo for blazing fast inference CatBoost Model.

### Messaging

*   [rabbitroutine (‚≠ê112)](https://github.com/furdarius/rabbitroutine) - Lightweight library that handles RabbitMQ auto-reconnect and publishing retries. The library takes into account the need to re-declare entities in RabbitMQ after reconnection.

### Microsoft Word

*   [godocx (‚≠ê187)](https://github.com/gomutex/godocx) - Library for reading and writing Microsoft Word (Docx) files.

### Networking

*   [cloudflared (‚≠ê11k)](https://github.com/cloudflare/cloudflared) - Cloudflare Tunnel client (formerly Argo Tunnel).

### Security

*   [entpassgen (‚≠ê5)](https://github.com/andreimerlescu/entpassgen) - Entropy Password Generator with extensive command line arguments to generate random strings securely including digits, passwords, and passwords built using obscure dictionary words mixed with symbols and digits.

### Go Tools / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

*   [MoniGO (‚≠ê274)](https://github.com/iyashjayesh/monigo) - A performance monitoring library for Go applications. It provides real-time insights into application performance! üöÄ

### Benchmarks / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

*   [golang-benchmarks (‚≠ê136)](https://github.com/SimonWaldherr/golang-benchmarks) - a collection of golang benchmarks.
items.content_html:
Bot Building

  • arikawa (‚≠ê531) - A library and framework for the Discord API.

Goroutines

  • rill (‚≠ê1.7k) - Go toolkit for clean, composable, channel-based concurrency.

Machine Learning

  • catboost-cgo (‚≠ê16) - Fast, scalable, high performance Gradient Boosting on Decision Trees library. Golang using Cgo for blazing fast inference CatBoost Model.

Messaging

  • rabbitroutine (‚≠ê112) - Lightweight library that handles RabbitMQ auto-reconnect and publishing retries. The library takes into account the need to re-declare entities in RabbitMQ after reconnection.

Microsoft Word

  • godocx (‚≠ê187) - Library for reading and writing Microsoft Word (Docx) files.

Networking

  • cloudflared (‚≠ê11k) - Cloudflare Tunnel client (formerly Argo Tunnel).

Security

  • entpassgen (‚≠ê5) - Entropy Password Generator with extensive command line arguments to generate random strings securely including digits, passwords, and passwords built using obscure dictionary words mixed with symbols and digits.

Go Tools / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

  • MoniGO (‚≠ê274) - A performance monitoring library for Go applications. It provides real-time insights into application performance! üöÄ

Benchmarks / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

  • golang-benchmarks (‚≠ê136) - a collection of golang benchmarks.

items.title: Awesome Cern
items.content_text:
### Physics/mathematics analysis/simulation / Event Management

*   [Xsuite](https://xsuite.web.cern.ch): A collection of Python packages for simulating beam dynamics in particle accelerators with support of different computing platforms, such as OpenMP and various GPU frameworks.
items.content_html:
Physics/mathematics analysis/simulation / Event Management

  • Xsuite: A collection of Python packages for simulating beam dynamics in particle accelerators with support of different computing platforms, such as OpenMP and various GPU frameworks.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### AI / Diagnostics

*   [milanglacier/minuet-ai.nvim (‚≠ê686)](https://github.com/milanglacier/minuet-ai.nvim) - Minuet offers code completion from LLM providers including OpenAI (compatible), Gemini, Claude, Ollama, Deepseek and more providers, with support for nvim-cmp, blink.cmp and virtual-text frontend.

### Neovim Lua Development / Diagnostics

*   [OXY2DEV/helpview.nvim (‚≠ê352)](https://github.com/OXY2DEV/helpview.nvim) - A hackable & fancy `vimdoc/help` file viewer.
items.content_html:
AI / Diagnostics

  • milanglacier/minuet-ai.nvim (‚≠ê686) - Minuet offers code completion from LLM providers including OpenAI (compatible), Gemini, Claude, Ollama, Deepseek and more providers, with support for nvim-cmp, blink.cmp and virtual-text frontend.

Neovim Lua Development / Diagnostics

  • OXY2DEV/helpview.nvim (‚≠ê352) - A hackable & fancy vimdoc/help file viewer.

items.title: Awesome Tmux
items.content_text:
### Tools and session management

*   [mynav (‚≠ê165)](https://github.com/GianlucaP106/mynav) Workspace and session management TUI built on tmux
items.content_html:
Tools and session management

  • mynav (‚≠ê165) Workspace and session management TUI built on tmux
